name: Ancient Scarlet-Plume Finch
description: An ancient species of finch, with feathers that blaze like fire, boasting longer plumage and larger bodies compared to ordinary ones.\nUpon arriving in the Realm Within, they swiftly integrated into the community thanks to their innate "passion." However, for the diminutive Paimon, this "passion" is sometimes overwhelming â€” especially when they attempt to dive into her embrace at speeds far surpassing that of an average finch...
